name: Datascape Phoenix - Fengfeng
text:
2+ Level 6 monsters
Once per turn: You can detach 2 materials from this card, then target 1 face-up card your opponent controls and 1 card in either GY; banish them. If this Xyz Summoned card is destroyed by battle with an opponent's attacking monster, or by an opponent's card effect while in its owner's Monster Zone: You can Special Summon 2 "Datascape" monsters from your Deck with the same Type and Attribute as each other. You can only use this effect of "Datascape Phoenix - Fengfeng" once per turn.
